recipe.title: Breakfast Turkey Sausages Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Add the turkey, pepper, thyme, sage, garlic powder, and salt to a large bowl and mix to combine.
Form the turkey meat into eight equal patties.
Heat a skillet on medium heat and coat with a bit of oil. Cook patties for 5-10 minutes on each side, or until the inside is no longer pink.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add the turkey, pepper, thyme, sage, garlic powder, and salt to a large bowl and mix to combine.
Form the turkey meat into eight equal patties.
Heat a skillet on medium heat and coat with a bit of oil.
Cook patties for 5-10 minutes on each side, or until the inside is no longer pink.
